name: Stand O'Food 3 HD
description:
The immersive free-to-play version, Stand O’Food® City: Virtual Frenzy, is already live! Don't miss out!

Love Stand O’Food® 3? Don’t miss Stand O'Food Empire on iPad!
The most popular burger-serving game gets a much-awaited sequel! Riding the wave of success in his hometown, Ronnie the Chef extends the operations of Stand O’Food chain to Tinseltown, where he meets Nikki and Mr. Clarence, and disrupts revenge plans of the evil Mr. Torg. Open restaurants around Tinseltown, and serve clients fast and healthy food in 25 restaurants under his management. An exciting and fast-paced time management/puzzle game, Stand O’Food 3 will definitely entertain and challenge you!

TRY IT FREE, THEN UNLOCK THE FULL ADVENTURE FROM WITHIN THE GAME!

● 75 levels in 5 settings, 12 bonus levels
● 25 cafes around the city with a full menu of foods to serve
● Add French fries, ice cream, coffee, and soda!
● Master a total of 90 recipes with over 18 special sauce
● Unlock over 33 achievements to obtain expert status
● Game Center Support
____________________________

Game available in: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Brazilian Portuguese, Russian, Korean, Chinese, Japanese
